TextpageLeftNav.bodyText:
Container Registry（Preview）Container Registry

Store and manage container images across all types of Azure deployments

Apply for 1RMB Trial Buy Now

Azure Container Registry provides storage of private Docker container images, enabling fast, scalable retrieval, and network-close deployment of container workloads on Azure. Azure Container Registry also provides additional capabilities, such as Azure Active Directory-based authentication, webhook support, and delete operations.

Free during the Azure Container Registry preview.

Support & SLA

If you have any questions or need help, please visit Azure Support and select self-help service or any other method to contact us for support.

Azure Container Registry doesn’t offer a Service Level Agreement during the preview period. If you want to learn more about the details of our server level agreement, please visit the Service Level Agreement page.
TextpageLeftNav.pageTitle: Container Registry services quotes_price budgeting - Azure Cloud Computing
TextpageLeftNav.metaKeywords: Azure, Azure Container Registry, 价格
TextpageLeftNav.metaDescription: Learn more about the pricing details for Azure Container Registry. Azure Container Registry is currently available through Cloud Services and is offered as a free tier service. There are no additional charges for using Container Registry services in free tier services. You only pay for the underlying computing resources consumed by the selected Cloud Services instance, and the cost will be billed according to the number of minutes of use. A 1RMB Trial gets you ¥ 1,500 in service credits. You can also make a direct purchase and become a Pay-in-Advance Azure customer.
